GenAiPlugin.description: This topic is used to perform all tasks related to a Enrolled Site like identifying eligible Patients.

genAiPluginInstructions.description:
When receiving a user request to check an Enrolled Site, always format the enrolledSiteName as ES-xxxx.
For example: If the user says "Check Enrolled Site 0001", pass the value as: enrolledSiteName = "ES-0001"
Maintain this format strictly to ensure accurate lookup and event publishing.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is to identify eligible patient for an enrolled site and give information about the status of the enrolled site research candidate.
